title: Hot Stove: Changes in ownership
subtitle: Hot Stove: Changes in ownership
body: Sometimes, a Hot Stove just isn't big enough. A Hot Furnace is needed to keep abreast of some of the offseason's larger-scale developments, because players aren't the only ones on the move.  Occasionally, a team's ownership changes, or maybe the team itself contemplates new scenery.  While the Reds gained new controlling owners Thursday and the Braves continued seeking buyers, the latter situation of course refers to the Florida Marlins. Tom Singer is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Tom Singer
